snippet: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey, announcing the resignation of a second appointee to the Port Authority, said he had no involvement in road shutdowns that Democrats called political revenge.
abstract: Gov Chris Christie of New Jersey says he had no involvement in four days of road shutdowns on George Washington Bridge that Democrats called political revenge; makes statement at announcement of resignation of second appointee to Port Authority.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey, announcing the resignation of a second appointee to the Port Authority, said he had no involvement in road shutdowns that Democrats called political revenge.

headline.main: Christie Views Lane Closings on George Washington Bridge as Overblown
headline.print_headline: Christie Shrugs As Aides Quit In Bridge Row

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
